body: Should we also set the new `data_format` in `else`? Someone might forget to set it if we leave it to the programmer to set it manually after `copy_attr`.
body_html: Should we also set the new data_format in else? Someone might forget to set it if we leave it to the programmer to set it manually after copy_attr.
